mapper.sql: pro_id, man_id, brd_id, title, sku_cd, upc, ean, retail_price, mininum_retail_price, warranty_day, time_unit, model, created_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, call_cnt, sts_cd, deleted, proState
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from pro_product
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from pro_product
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
p.pro_id ,p.man_id, p.brd_id, p.title, p.sku_cd, p.upc, p.ean, p.retail_price, p.mininum_retail_price,
p.warranty_day, p.time_unit, p.model, p.create_time,p.last_update_time,
p.proState,p.warranty,
b.name_en,
category.prc_id,category.category_name , category.category_path,
img.img_id,img.uri , img.type_cd,
pck.pck_id , pck.width, pck.height, pck.length , pck.weight
from pro_product p ,brd_brand b , prc_product_category category ,img_image img ,pck_package_info pck
where p.brd_id=b.brd_id and p.pro_id = category.pro_id and p.pro_id = img.pro_id and p.pro_id=pck.pro_id
AND img.type_cd = 0
And p.man_id=#{manId}
AND pro_id = #{proId}
AND title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
AND ( category_path like concat('%', #{categoryName}, '%') or category_name like concat('%', #{categoryName}, '%') )
AND (name_en like concat('%', #{brandName}, '%') or name_cn like concat('%', #{brandName}, '%'))
AND retail_price >= #{lowPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
AND retail_price <= #{topPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')

select
p.pro_id , p.brd_id, p.title, p.sku_cd, p.upc, p.ean, p.retail_price, p.mininum_retail_price,
p.warranty_day, p.time_unit, p.model, p.create_time,p.last_update_time,
p.proState,p.warranty,
b.name_en,
category.prc_id,category.category_name , category.category_path,
img.img_id,img.uri , img.type_cd,
pck.pck_id , pck.width, pck.height, pck.length , pck.weight
from pro_product p ,brd_brand b , prc_product_category category ,img_image img ,pck_package_info pck
where p.brd_id=b.brd_id and p.pro_id = category.pro_id and p.pro_id = img.pro_id and p.pro_id=pck.pro_id
AND p.pro_id = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into pro_product (pro_id, man_id, brd_id, title, sku_cd, upc, ean, retail_price, mininum_retail_price, warranty_day, time_unit, model, created_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, call_cnt, sts_cd, deleted, proState, warranty ) values (#{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mininumRetailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warrantyDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{callCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stsCd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{prostate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warranty,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

insert into pro_product
pro_id,
man_id,
brd_id,
title,
sku_cd,
upc,
ean,
retail_price,
mininum_retail_price,
warranty_day,
time_unit,
model,
created_by,
create_time,
last_update_by,
last_update_time,
call_cnt,
sts_cd,
deleted,
proState,
warranty,

mapper.update:
update pro_product
pro_id = #{record.proId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
man_id = #{record.manId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brd_id = #{record.brdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_cd = #{record.skuCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upc = #{record.upc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ean = #{record.ean,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
retail_price = #{record.retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mininum_retail_price = #{record.mininumRetailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
warranty_day = #{record.warrantyDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_unit = #{record.timeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{record.model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_by = #{record.lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_time = #{record.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
call_cnt = #{record.callCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sts_cd = #{record.stsCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
proState = #{record.prostate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warranty = #{record.warranty,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update pro_product set pro_id = #{record.proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, man_id = #{record.manId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brd_id = #{record.brdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_cd = #{record.skuCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upc = #{record.upc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ean = #{record.ean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, retail_price = #{record.retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mininum_retail_price = #{record.mininumRetailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, warranty_day = #{record.warrantyDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_unit = #{record.timeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{record.model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_by = #{record.lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{record.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, call_cnt = #{record.callCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sts_cd = #{record.stsCd,jdbcType=CHAR}, deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, proState = #{record.prostate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warranty = #{record.warranty,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update pro_product set pro_id = #{record.proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, man_id = #{record.manId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brd_id = #{record.brdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_cd = #{record.skuCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upc = #{record.upc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ean = #{record.ean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, retail_price = #{record.retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mininum_retail_price = #{record.mininumRetailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, warranty_day = #{record.warrantyDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_unit = #{record.timeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{record.model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_by = #{record.lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{record.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, call_cnt = #{record.callCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sts_cd = #{record.stsCd,jdbcType=CHAR}, deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, proState = #{record.prostate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

man_id = #{manId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brd_id = #{brdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_cd = #{skuCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
